FuncDef: The display y1731 period-data command displays performance statistics of a specified type.
CLIs: display y1731 period-data statistic-type { single-loss | twoway-delay | single-synthetic-loss } test-id <test-id-value>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about single-ended frame loss measurement.
-

Displays statistics about two-way frame delay measurement.
-

Displays statistics about single-ended synthetic frame loss measurement.
-

Specifies the ID of a test instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays performance statistics of a specified type.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display y1731 period-data statistic-type single-loss test-id 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view performance statistics of a specified type, run the display y1731 period-data command. The statistics include those about single-ended frame loss measurement, single-ended synthetic frame loss measurement, and two-way frame delay measurement.
